modifier.worldmodifiers.max_health.descr: Modifies the maximum health of all mobs (including players). The modified maximum health will not exceed vanilla's restriction (1024).
modifier.worldmodifiers.movement_speed.d: Modifies the movement speed of all mobs (including players), but does not affect the flying speed.
modifier.worldmodifiers.movement_speed.w: WARNING: Due to vanilla logic, when the modifier's value is very low, non-player mobs will be almost unable to move.
worldmodifiers.editModifier.confirmation: %d modifiers' values have been changed. Are you sure you want to discard these changes?
worldmodifiers.editModifier.title: Edit Modifiers
worldmodifiers.selectWorld.extremeDiffic: Hostile mobs spawn and deal even more damage. The depletion of the hunger bar brings deadlier effects.
